name: Marina Satti
description: '''Marina Satti''' ({{langx|el|Μαρίνα Σάττι}}; born 26 December 1986) is a Greek singer, composer, music producer, and actress. Her music fuses [[Greek traditional music|traditional Greek]] and [[Balkan music|Balkan]] sounds with modern [[Pop music|pop]], [[hip-hop]], and [[Electronic music|electronic]] production.
